title: EvolveQuantum
author: EvolveQuantum
content: EvolveQuantum blockchainEvolveQuantum is a new blockchain platform designed to provide smart contract publishing and trading capabilities. It uses EVQ as a transaction fee and allows EVQ holders to pledge and receive rewards. In addition, EvolveQuantum supports cross-chain payments with other chains to enable the exchange of assets.ConclusionEvolveQuantum aims to be a powerful and flexible blockchain platform that provides users with smart contract publishing and trading capabilities. By using EVQ as transaction fees and pledge rewards, as well as supporting cross-chain payments, EvolveQuantum will provide users with a secure, efficient and interoperable blockchain ecosystem.POWTotal EVQ supply: 1.2 billionHalving time: every six monthsBlock time: 20 secondsInitial block reward: 155Algorithm: EthashFirst block time: 1023-09-23 11:00:00 (UTC)No pre-digging, fair start. The airdrop bonus has a strict anti-brush mechanismWebsite https://www.evolveq.org/Whitepaper https://www.evolveq.org/whitepaper Wallets Linux/Mac/Windows: https://github.com/EvolveQuantumORG/walletMining Pools https://pool.evolveq.org/Exchanges: https://explorer.evolveq.org/Airdrop: https://airdrop.evolveq.org/Discord: https://discord.gg/KK5dysRjwSTwitter https://twitter.com/EvolveQ_EVQ

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: I am certain it is 1 or 2 people making all these ANN postings of useless, and incomplete, projects. Why? No idea! Clearly they must be bored.

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: If you are going to use AI to create your logo of this potential scam project... you could at least TRY to make the words spell the same name as your project.

comments.author: Ms_Mining
comments.body: The unusual algorithm (like ETC) and different logos on the resources hint that this project is very similar to a scam. If you're ready to take a risk, then start mining.
